item.title: Create Arrow Without Image
item.description: We need to two div continers to accomplish this. One is outside div container, and the other is inside div container, which is the arrow. In the inside div, we need to use transform, rotate and scall, to make it look like arrow. We also need to centralize the inside div. Because the posistion is absolute, we need to use left:50% and margin-left:-12px. The negative 12px is the half of the inside div’s width.
